title.narrative: Bangladesh - Higher Education Quality Enhancement Project

description.narrative: The main objective of the project is to improve the quality and relevance of the teaching and research environment in highereducation institutions through encouraging both innovation and accountability within universities and by enhancing the technicaland institutional capacity of the higher education sector.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Sched 2, Section I, para A.5 | Description :The QAU at UGC shall establish (a) at least 12 IQAC at theparticipating universities within 18 months of the Effective Date; and (b) provide IQACF grants. | Due Date :12-Sep-2015
Finance Agreement :Sched 2, Section I, para A.7a | Description :Reconstitute the audit committee, within 3 months of the EffectiveDate | Due Date :12-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Sched 2, Section I, para A.7b | Description :Adopt an IQACF Operations Manual by the earlier of: the date whichis 6 months from the Effective Date, or the date on which the first IQACF Sub-project is proposed to be approved | Due Date:12-Sep-2014
Finance Agreement :Sched 2, Section I, para A.7c | Description :Submit to Parliament a law on QAACB within 24 months of theEffective Date. | Due Date :12-Mar-2016

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Section I, para A.4 | Description :Establish a QAU at the UGC by the earlier of, the date which is 6months after the Effective Date or the date on which the first set of IQACFs are approved, to be headed by an experienced QAindividual from the universities satisfactory to IDA and supported by QAspecialists | Due Date :16-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Section I, para. A. 8b | Description :UGC to complete all necessary legal, administrative, andinstitutional measures to constitute a trust that will manage and operate BdREN. | Due Date :12-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Section II, para. A. 1 | Description :Prepare project monitoring report and submit to IDA no laterthan forty-five (45) days after the each calendar semester | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Section II, para. B. 2 | Description :Submit to IDA satisfactory interim unaudited financial reportsfor the Project within 45 days from the end of each calendar quarterin form and substance satisfactory to IDA | Frequency :Quarterly
Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Section II, para. B. 3 | Description :Submit to IDA audit reports conducted by independent auditorswithin six months from the end of each fiscal year | Frequency :Yearly
